mapper.sql: SELECT spl.pr_line_id poPlanLineId, spl.pr_header_id poPlanHeaderId, spl.tenant_id tenantId, spl.attribute_varchar22 status, spl.attribute_bigint14 spellDocProvince, spl.needed_date needDate, spl.attribute_varchar23 planSharedProvince, spl.company_id provinceCompanyId, hc.company_name provinceCompany, spl.product_name productName, spl.attribute_varchar24 specification, spl.supplier_id initialSupplierId, spl.supplier_name initialSupplier, spl.unit_price factoryPrice, spl.attribute_varchar25 deliveryAddress, spl.item_id materialId, spl.item_code materialCoding, spl.quantity requiredQuantity, spl.uom_id uomId, su.uom_name unitName, spl.currency_code currencyId, sc.currency_name currencyName, spl.attribute_varchar38 freightSupplier, spl.line_freight freightPrice, spl.attribute_varchar39 priceTerms, spl.remark remark, spl.tax_id taxId, spl.tax_code taxType, spl.tax_rate taxRate, spl.pr_requested_name applicant, spl.attachment_uuid appendixId FROM sprm_pr_header sph LEFT JOIN sprm_pr_line spl ON spl.pr_header_id = sph.pr_header_id LEFT JOIN smdm_item si ON si.item_id = spl.item_id LEFT JOIN smdm_uom su ON su.uom_id = spl.uom_id LEFT JOIN smdm_currency sc ON sc.currency_id = spl.currency_code LEFT JOIN hpfm_company hc ON hc.company_id = spl.company_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sprm_pr_line (pr_header_id, tenant_id, attribute_varchar22, attribute_bigint14, needed_date, attribute_varchar23, product_name, attribute_varchar24, supplier_id, supplier_name, unit_price, attribute_varchar25, item_id, item_code, quantity, uom_id, currency_code, attribute_varchar38, line_freight, attribute_varchar39, remark, tax_code, tax_rate, pr_requested_name, display_line_num, company_id, attachment_uuid) VALUE (#{poPlanHeaderId}, #{tenantId}, #{status}, #{spellDocProvince}, #{needDate}, #{planSharedProvince}, #{productName}, #{specification}, #{initialSupplierId}, #{initialSupplier}, #{factoryPrice}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{materialId}, #{materialCoding}, #{requiredQuantity}, #{uomId}, #{currencyId}, #{freightSupplier}, #{freightPrice}, #{priceTerms}, #{remark}, #{taxType}, #{taxRate}, #{applicant}, #{serialNum}, #{provinceCompanyId}, #{appendixId} )
mapper.update: update sprm_pr_line set attribute_varchar22 = #{status}, attribute_bigint14 = #{spellDocProvince}, needed_date = #{needDate}, attribute_varchar23 = #{planSharedProvince}, company_id = #{provinceCompanyId}, product_name = #{productName}, attribute_varchar24 = #{specification}, supplier_id = #{initialSupplierId}, supplier_name = #{initialSupplier}, unit_price = #{factoryPrice}, attribute_varchar25 = #{deliveryAddress}, spl.item_id = #{materialId}, item_code = #{materialCoding}, quantity = #{requiredQuantity}, uom_id = #{uomId}, currency_code = #{currencyId}, attribute_varchar38 = #{freightSupplier}, line_freight = #{freightPrice}, attribute_varchar39 = #{priceTerms}, remark = #{remark}, tax_code = #{taxType}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, pr_requested_name = #{applicant}, attachment_uuid = #{appendixId} where pr_line_id = #{poPlanLineId}
